meanings.definition: A group of people working together to achieve a common goal.
meanings.sent1: The soccer team practiced hard to win the game.
meanings.sent2: The team of doctors collaborated to save the patient's life.
meanings.sent3: The team of chefs accidentally added too much salt to the soup.
meanings.sent4: Their team was like a well-oiled machine, smoothly completing tasks.
meanings.sent5: The team's unity and determination were truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Two or more animals working together as a unit.
meanings.sent1: The lionesses formed a team to hunt for food.
meanings.sent2: The ants worked as a team to build their anthill.
meanings.sent3: The team of squirrels comically tried to steal nuts from the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: The bees functioned as a team, each with a specific role in the hive.
meanings.sent5: The team of dolphins swam gracefully in perfect synchronization.

meanings.definition: To come together as a team.
meanings.sent1: We need to team up to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: Let's team together to clean up the park.
meanings.sent3: The siblings decided to team up against their parents in a snowball fight.
meanings.sent4: The birds teamed up to chase away the squirrel from their nest.
meanings.sent5: The students teamed together to solve the challenging math problem.
